attributes.action: Stop confusing email with the Web
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: While it is reasonable to send a confirmation email, why is it not possible to simply REPLY to that email directly from an email client rather than wasting time starting a Web browser and copying and pasting a Website link from an email message just to do a simple "OK" or "confirm"?

rejection.details: Please address any issues with the petitions system to "team@petitions.pm.gov.uk".
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
